def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper
widget.View.Commands["DELETE"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("EXCLUIR_TABELASPISCOFINS") widget.View.Commands["EDIT"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_TABELASPISCOFINS") widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_TABELASPISCOFINS")
